name: Avoid artifacts using exit and die expressions (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all artifacts using exit and die expressions.
output:
This report lists all artifacts using exit and die expressions.

This QR provides the following information:
Artifact full name.
rationale: Exit and die expressions end the program prematurely without giving any chance to do error handling.
remediation: Instead of exit or die expressions, use exception handling and graceful program exit.
remediationSample:
<?php
class CastTest {
   public function test($param) {
      if (90 === $param) {
         throw new Exception("Param should not be 90");
      }
      if (45 === $param) {
         throw new Exception("param should not be 45");
      }
   }
}
try {
   $obj = new CastTest();
   $obj->test(90);
} catch(Exception $e) {
   echo $e->getMessage(), PHP_EOL;
}

?>
sample:
<?php
class CastTest {
   public function test($param) {
      if (90 === $param) {
         exit(10);  //violation
      }
      if(45 === $param) {
         die(5);    //violation
      }
   }
}
$obj = new CastTest();
$obj->test(90);
?>
